data.title: Beaufontaine
data.meta_description: Move-in ready homes by Ivory Homes in Heber. Explore the available home designs at Beaufontaine. Visit our model homes and book your dream home today in Heber!
data.text: This meticulously planned residential area is set to feature serene ponds, inviting parks, and shared amenities within its bounds, all accompanied by community-maintained landscaping. Enthusiasts of refreshing air and exciting escapades are bound to develop a fond attachment to this locale, conveniently situated mere minutes away from Utah's unparalleled outdoor recreational offerings. These include various activities such as skiing, golfing, fly fishing, snowmobiling, 4-wheeling, hiking, biking, and more. Walking and bike trails in the community connect to miles of premium trails. Beyond the awe-inspiring vistas that abound, the newly constructed homes in this vicinity are tailored and immaculate in their design and execution.
